{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated \$186.4K in 2021-2022 on contracts with ADAPT PHARMA CANADA.
{{< /entity_summary >}}

{{< details summary="See original contracts and amendments" panel_body_class="vendor-names-list" >}}
